attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to: 'Honour     Sheffield Wednesday And Nottingham Forrest  Legend Des Walker      With An MBE For Services To Football'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Des Walker was the best defender in the world in his prime. At     Sheffield Wednesday he had his own song 'You'll never beat Des     Walker'. He represented England on 59 occasions. The pacy hard     tackling defender still wouldn't look out of place in the     Premiership now. He played 265 games for Nottingham Forrest,     307 games for Sheffield Wednesday. He was the John Terry of his     era and he showed how good he was by getting 59 caps for     England.
